title: Mass conservation - compare flow rate and speed

content.description: Fluid is flowing in the tube with circular cross-sections shown in the figure. Section <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of the tube has diameter <math alttext="2 d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi></math> and Section <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has diameter <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the volume flow rate <math alttext="Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> in Section <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> to the volume flow rate <math alttext="Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> in Section <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> and the speed of the fluid <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> in Section <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> to the speed of the fluid <math alttext="v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> in Section <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> ?
content.question: Flow RateSpeedA<math alttext="Q sub 1 equals Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math><math alttext="v sub 1 equals v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>B<math alttext="Q sub 1 equals Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math><math alttext="v sub 1 is less than v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>C<math alttext="Q sub 1 is greater than Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math><math alttext="v sub 1 equals v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>D<math alttext="Q sub 1 is greater than Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math><math alttext="v sub 1 is less than v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
